question: Modern forms of communication such as email and messaging have reduced the amount of time people spend seeing their friends. This has had a negative effect on their social lives.
text: Due to electronic inventions people prefer to connect with their friends or family with this electronic dive. As a result of this development they can communicate with others, don’t matter where they are. However, some people believe this version of communicate prevents face-to-face talk and have a bad influence on humans’ relationships. I absolutely disagree that modern communicate ways are unhealthy.

Looking back on the past, people communicate with friends via letters and phone, but these two ways take a long time and are quite expensive for users. In addition, being busy and far distance cause complicated to connect for society. Hence, under these circumstances, today people can communicate comfortably and easily with their relatives than previous years. For instance, even you are at work or abroad because of different reasons you are still connected with your friends, thusthus it is most obvious consequence of modern technology. Furthermore, telecommunications make accessible to every person to inform  and reach others all across the globe.

Nowadays, almost people use modern form of communication such as email and messaging, which is much more convenient owing to their benefits. Firstly? Everyone can send instant message to their friends everywhere with a very cheap price. Secondly, these modern forms are updated so that people can send out voice messages,pictures, emojis making the content of the conversation more interesting/ For example, in my case, I have some foreign friends w

Taking everything into account, I completely disagree with the statement in the question and firmly believe that modern communications have greatly improved people’s social lives
